name: 100 Kotowaza, 100 Balances
tagline: To combine my love of Japanese & acrobatics.
body:
Llamasforlife.github.io
=======================

#100 Kotowaza, 100 Balances

**Kotowaza** are Japanese proverbs

##For every acrobalance sequence I create, it's name/ID will be a Kotowaza. 

This website is for people who want to....
* Challenge themselves in Japanese AND/OR
* Challenge themselves physically

###Why am I doing this?

1.     Fun fun fun
1.     To study Japanese
1.     Have proverbs engrained in my mind to guide me
1.     Maintain balance, flexibility, breathing, strength, focus
1.     To challenge myself and other people
1.     Learn how to build a website
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
